aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text: Fidar company is one of the very few companies in Asia considering security of telecom core network. The main telecom-related activities of this company are producing different security softwares and providing professional services for telecom operators.
aboutUs.supportText: Providing consulting and support services in the fields of network, computer systems safety, communication systems
aboutUs.longTermText: Build long-term relationships based on trust and integrity
aboutUs.jointActivitiesText: Carrying out joint activities in the field of technology

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.text:
Thank you for your choice. Please provide the following information about your job
 requirements to help us serve you better. This information allows us to transfer your
 request to the appropriate person. You should receive a response within 48 hours.

contactUs.secondAddress: 3rd Floor, 4th Alley, No. 7, Sadeghi St., Azadi St., Tehran, Iran
